title: Arancio Americano Recipe
full_text:
Arancio Americano Recipe

Cook Mode

Ingredients
Ice
3/4
ounce
sweet vermouth
1/2
ounce
Campari
1
ounce
fresh
orange juice
2
ounces
chilled
prosecco
Directions
Fill a wine glass with ice and add vermouth, Campari and orange juice. Gently stir to combine; top with chilled prosecco.
